CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that comments in stylesheets are parsed correctly by the DevTools.

Main style:
[expanded] 
element.style { ()

[expanded] 
#main { (<style>…</style>)
/-- overloaded --/ /-- disabled --/     /* color: red; */
    color/* color: red */:/* color: red */ green/* color: red */;
/-- overloaded --/ /-- disabled --/     /* color: red; */

[expanded] 
#main { (<style>…</style>)
/-- overloaded --/ /-- disabled --/     /* color: red; */
    background /* color: red */ :/* color: red */blue/* color: red */;
/-- overloaded --/ /-- disabled --/     /* color: red; */

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;
